name: run-pty
author: Simon Lydell
description: Run several commands concurrently. Show output for one command at a time. Kill all at once.

scripts.start: node run-pty.js % cat % false % echo hello world % ping localhost % node get-cursor-position.js % node test-keys.js % node signals.js % node slow-kill.js % node slow-kill.js 2000 "Shutting downâ€¦" % make watch % make signals % node test-clear-down.js % node colored-log.js
scripts.auto-exit: node run-pty.js --auto-exit=2 % sleep 3 % sleep 1 % sleep 2 % sleep 1 % sleep 1 && echo success
scripts.test: node run-pty.js --auto-exit % prettier --check . % eslint . --report-unused-disable-directives % tsc % jest
